title: chat wont work on my account
body: chat wont connect on my account, this is true for the game client and the mobile app, neither will work with chat, have submitted multiple tickets but nothings been done as of yet. have reinstalled, have reset my modem, have initiated full repair, nothing will work

replies.body:
I'm afraid I have no idea what could be going on here other than some sort of connection issue. I think support is probably the best option for you here but it sounds like they might be a bit stumped too.

Past that, I'd recommend trying any of the possible solutions here that you haven't already:
https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/LbPY3Rpr-experiencing-a-tech-problem-find-the-common-fixes-here#connection
